## PopulatedGivetyTransaction interface

A transaction that has been prepared for sending.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PopulatedGivetyTransaction<P = unknown, T extends SentGivetyTransaction = SentGivetyTransaction> 
```

## Remarks
